All Classes

Class
Description
AbstractBullet
This is abstract bullet class, defining the method of moving, painting and collide check.
AbstractFactory
Create abstract classes for the Bullet and Shuttle objects to get the factory.
AbstractShuttle
This is abstract shuttle class, defining the method of key event detect, move, collide check and fire.
Asteroid
This is Asteroid class.
Background
This is Background class, responsible for defining background of game stage according to the background type users determine.
Bullet1
This is bullet1 class to create bullet in level 1.
Bullet2
This is bullet2 class to create bullet in level 2.
Bullet3
This is bullet3 class to create bullet in level 3.
BulletFactory
Create corresponding bullet according to the player's choice using factory method pattern.
Direction
This is an enum class to define the status shuttle can have.
Director
This class is using singleton pattern to control all stages.
EndGameStage
This class is to load end game interface.
EndGameStageController
This controller is to control end game stage, including ranking, restart button and back to primary stage button.
EndGameStageController.UpdateRanking
Create cells and highlight current instance.
Explosion
This is Explosion class, responsible for create explosion and control the place of explosion.
FactoryProducer
This class is a factory generator to get corresponding factory by passing bullet or shuttle information.
GameObjects
This is a parent class of all classes what the game can see, including their image, place, size and stage.
GameStageController
This is gameStage controller to detect key activities by user in the game stage.
GameStageController.KeyProcess
 
GameStageModel
This class uses singleton pattern to process game stage data from game stage view, including update the shuttle's blood point, asteroid fall speed and so on in real time.
GameStageView
This class draws the game stage by refreshing constantly to achieve the effect that the screen changes in real time.
InfoStage
This class is to load info interface.
InfoStageController
This controller is to detect button click event and go back to the primary stage.
NormalFire
Shuttle in level 1 will use this fire strategy.
OptionStage
This class is to load option interface.
OptionStageController
This controller is to control option stage.
PauseGameStage
This class is to load pause game interface and define some styles of the stage.
PauseStageController
This controller is to control pause stage, including restart the game, end the game, mute and restore the game.
PrimaryStage
This class is to load primary interface.
PrimaryStageController
This controller is to control primary stage.
Ranking
This class is to store, select and display ranking by using sqlite.
RankingStage
This class is to load ranking interface.
RankingStageController
This controller is to control ranking stage.
Role
This is an abstract class inheriting GameObjects, objects that will spawn and disappear will inherit this clas.
S1S2L2Fire
Shuttle 1 and shuttle 2 in level 2 will use this fire strategy.
S1S2L3Fire
Shuttle 1 and shuttle 2 in level 3 will use this fire strategy.
S3S4L2Fire
Shuttle 3 and shuttle 4 in level 2 will use this fire strategy.
S3S4L3Fire
Shuttle 3 and shuttle 4 in level 3 will use this fire strategy.
SecondStage
This class is to load second interface.
SecondStageController
This controller is to control second stage.
Shuttle1
This is Shuttle 1 class, responsible for defining the fundamental properties of the shuttle and upgrade.
Shuttle2
This is Shuttle 2 class, responsible for defining the fundamental properties of the shuttle and upgrade.
Shuttle3
This is Shuttle 3 class, responsible for defining the fundamental properties of the shuttle and upgrade.
Shuttle4
This is Shuttle 4 class, responsible for defining the fundamental properties of the shuttle and upgrade.
ShuttleFactory
Create corresponding shuttle according to the player's choice using factory method pattern.
ShuttleFire
This interface enables classes that implement it to apply various kinds of fire strategy according to strategy pattern.
SoundEffect
This class is a utility class to play various sounds, like explosion, button and background music.
SpaceAsteroid
Main application of all game, to launch the game.
